attributes.additional_details: I believe it’s just fair are salary be put up by law as we have the lives of many people in are hands
attributes.background: Us fire alarm engineers should be on way more money for the work we do and the responsibility we have to carry if something goes wrong. We work on live safety systems and don’t get paid the correct wage.

rejection.details: The terms and conditions of engineers are the responsibility of their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament. If you believe you are entitled to an increase in your salary, you should speak to your employer.
